title: Introduction to Numbers
description: This topic introduces children to counting numbers, starting from 1 to 20.
sample: Example: Count the fruits on the table. If there are 5 apples, the number is 5.

title: Addition and Subtraction
description: Students learn basic addition and subtraction using small numbers.
sample: 2 + 3 = 5. If you have 5 oranges and give away 2, you are left with 3.

title: Basic English Grammar
description: This topic teaches the basics of grammar like nouns, verbs, and adjectives.
sample: Example: The dog runs fast. ('dog' is a noun, 'runs' is a verb).

title: Reading Comprehension
sample: Read: 'The sun is bright.' Question: What is bright? Answer: The sun.

title: Living and Non-living Things
description: Children learn how to identify things that are alive and things that are not.
sample: Example: A dog is living because it eats and grows. A chair is non-living.
